backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing budgets, expenses, and user profiles with access control and CRUD-style methods.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old/new data types and a migration function that initializes empty state for the new expense/budget system.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file involved in the app’s UI, logic, and data flow.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining light/dark theme variables and applying base layout colors and borders.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up favicon, title, and mounting point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component wiring tabs, layout, navigation, and pages including the new Regular Expense tab.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling session state and query cache reset on logout.
frontend/src/components/deskboard/ClockC: Displays a live-updating clock and a monthly calendar grid with the current day highlighted.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Implements an error boundary that catches runtime errors and shows a recovery UI with reset and reload options.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the app header, login, workbook replace/reset controls, and handles Excel file uploading and validation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main page layout with header, footer, content area, and in‑app reminder notifications.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSi: Provides a sidebar navigation menu with primary and activity sections, highlighting and switching active tabs.
frontend/src/components/reminders/InAppR: Listens for reminder notifications, plays a sound, and displays them in a dialog with dismiss support.
frontend/src/components/search/ExploreHe: Shows inline Google search results via an iframe with fallback handling and an option to open results in a new tab.
frontend/src/components/table/DataPrevie: Renders a scrollable preview table of sheet headers and rows, including empty-sheet and empty-cell handling.
frontend/src/components/table/Horizontal: Provides a wrapper div that enables horizontal scrolling for wide tables using overflow-x-auto.
frontend/src/components/updateChecking/U: Renders a search bar with keyword input, match-type selector, and clear button for filtering update-checking results.
frontend/src/components/vlookup/VlookupA: Generates and plays step-by-step VLOOKUP explanation animations based on sheet data and search parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInAppReminderNotif: Polls reminders every second and triggers callback notifications when reminders become due, with cleanup logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductivityMutati: Defines mutation hooks for reminders, events, todos, and notes, all of which throw errors because the backend no longer supports them.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductivityQuerie: Exposes query hooks for reminders, events, todos, and notes, each returning empty arrays since the backend no longer supports them.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements history listing and mutation hooks that now operate as no-ops, returning or invalidating empty history due to backend removal.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegularExpense.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and mutate user budget and expenses via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables, macOS‑style UI classes, and wallpaper/desktop styling.
frontend/src/lib/compare/compareWorkbook: Implements workbook comparison by key, row, or column differences, returning structured results and summaries.
frontend/src/lib/compare/filterCompariso: Filters comparison rows by keyword using exact or contains matching across key and cell values.
frontend/src/lib/compare/normalizeRowSig: Creates deterministic row signatures and aligns old rows to new headers for comparison workflows.
frontend/src/lib/excel/normalizeHeader.t: Normalizes headers and provides lookup utilities for consistent header matching.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parseWorkbook.ts: Loads SheetJS dynamically and parses Excel files into structured sheet data with robust error handling.
Generates date‑range expense reports, totals, export rows, and filenames.
frontend/src/lib/export/branding.ts: Defines branding config and utilities to load logos as base64 or Image elements for exports.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportPdf.ts: Loads jsPDF dynamically and generates branded landscape PDFs with headers, footers, and tiled watermark, exporting tabular data.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportXlsx.ts: Loads SheetJS dynamically and exports data to an Excel file with a branded title row.
frontend/src/lib/export/pdfCompanyInfo.t: Defines static company contact, footer, and branding info used in PDF exports.
frontend/src/lib/vlookup/vlookup.ts: Implements exact and approximate VLOOKUP and multi‑lookup operations over sheet data with detailed results and summaries.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarTab.tsx: Displays and manages calendar events with create/delete dialogs, requiring user authentication.
frontend/src/pages/DeskboardTab.tsx: Provides a productivity dashboard with search, quick-add dialogs, and displays reminders, events, todos, and notes.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryTab.tsx: Shows local or backend history, supports clearing history, and exports VLOOKUP entries to Excel or PDF.
frontend/src/pages/NotesTab.tsx: Displays and manages user notes with create and delete actions gated by authentication.
frontend/src/pages/RegularExpenseTab.tsx: Handles budget settings, expense entry, and exporting expense reports for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/RemindersTab.tsx: Manages creation and deletion of meeting reminders, requiring user authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsTab.tsx: Displays VLOOKUP and comparison results with inline editing and export features.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: Provides VLOOKUP and filtering tools for workbook data with export options and stored search parameters.
frontend/src/pages/TodoTab.tsx: Renders a to‑do list UI with authentication checks and supports creating, deleting, and toggling items via mutations.
frontend/src/pages/UpdateCheckingTab.tsx: Handles uploading and parsing two Excel files, selecting sheets, and running comparisons with error handling and state updates.
frontend/src/pages/UploadTab.tsx: Allows users to upload and preview Excel files, select sheets, and update workbook state with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/state/appState.tsx: Defines global app state, workbook/search/filter/comparison types, history tracking, and context logic for updating shared state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color system, custom shadows, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, existing features, and new feature requests for an expense-tracking app with sidebar navigation, budgeting, expense logging, and PDF reports.
